casebody.data:
David SAWYER as the Administrator of the Estate of Mary E. Sawyer, Deceased, Petitioner
v.
Rita SAWYER, M.D., Respondent No. 820 MAL 2017 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. May 30, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 30th day of May, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
